mapper.select: select * from honey_tip order by code_no DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into honey_tip(code_no,ht_title, ht_contents, ht_file, u_id, ht_view, ht_like,date11) values(default,#{ht_title}, #{ht_contents}, #{ht_file}, #{u_id}, 0, 0,now());
insert into userinfo(id, pwd, nickname, email) values(#{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_email});
mapper.select: select id from userinfo where id=#{u_id};
